text: @realDonaldTrump Did you know that the United States of America has the highest number of COVID-19 cases? And, when confronted about the situation, its president said that we should use Lysol wipes and Clorox products in our lungs to kill any viruses. America is in deep trouble. And I'm American!

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Brand Category
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

domain.name: Product
domain.description: Products created by Brands.  Examples: Ford Explorer, Apple iPhone.

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
